storyInfo:
Matterhorn obeys SilverAsh's instructions, staying home alone to prepare Cliffheart's lunch.
Matterhorn also prepares a portion for Ethan, who often comes by to scavenge, but does not expect Ethan to come bearing a surprise for him as well.

attributes.content: 9:50 A.M. \ Sunny
Rhodes Island Landship, Compartment 2, Cafeteria
North Kjerag-style stir-fried greens, sprinkled with a little Rhodes Island Special Seasoning....
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: And we're done.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Wow! Looks delicious!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You flatter me.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Such leafy greens are rare in Kjerag, so I don't often get to cook dishes like this. Your approval brings me joy.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Things are different in the snowfields of Kjerag. Many goods are hard to come by, even with money. It's not like here on this landship, where supplies are so plentiful.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Supplies.... I think I heard Closure say something about that.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I guess Rhodes Island has like a special procurement channel that brings supplies and stuff to the ship.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: They have bases all over the place, so we can get all kinds of different ingredients from different places.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: That explains it. But they really have bases all over?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Um... I guess they're like offices or something? I don't really get this stuff.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: That reminds me, wasn't there a wishlist on the bulletin board outside the cafeteria? If there's anything special you like to eat, you can write it up there!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I heard those pretty girls in procurement check it every day!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: You're too sweet, Gummy! Call me pretty again and I'll bring you back some candy next time.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent A

attributes.content: You're gorgeous!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Atta-girl.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent A

attributes.content: Seriously...?
attributes.name: Procurement Agent B

attributes.content: Matterhorn, right? Just make a note of whatever you need on that bulletin board there and we'll procure it for you, if we get the chance.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent B

attributes.content: I understand. I'll make use of it if I find myself in need. Your efforts humble me.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: No need to go that far. This is our job, after all.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent B

attributes.content: What's with the stiffness? We're all friends here. Loosen up and talk like human beings already.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent A

attributes.content: You need to take our work more seriously!
attributes.name: Procurement Agent B

attributes.content: Don't mind her. We have things to do, so we'll get out of your hair for now.
attributes.name: Procurement Agent B

attributes.content: Hehe. Everybody's so nice. Last time we moored by a city, Closure even took me shopping with her!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: The stuff she bought was kinda weird.... But I still had fun!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Haha, I heard about that. Dr. Kal'tsit was very upset when she bought a big stone mask?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ahahahaha. Yeah! That mask was so creepy! I tried it on once.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Next time you see something so strange, perhaps you shouldn't touch it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ah, the food has cooled down and the temperature is perfect.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Mm. It's salty. This flavor may be a little bit much...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Don't worry, I'm sure it's great.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Do you think I could try some? Can I? Please let me have some, Uncle Matterhorn!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: U- uncle...?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (Am I that old now...?)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Of course you can. In fact, it would be a big help to me if you were my taste tester.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hooray!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Hehehe, c'mon, lemme try... Oh?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Huh? What's wrong?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Um.... Hm. I kinda feel like there's less food on this plate than there was a second ago?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: So weird. Am I going crazy...?
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Oh well. Gimme a bite!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Ommmm——nom.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: (chewing and munching)
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: How... how is it?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Omnom nomnom. Gulp.
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: It's great!!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: The veggies are crunchy and juicy and super refreshing and seasoned juuust right. It's really, really good!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: O- oh? I appreciate the compliment.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: But I think you're exaggerating a bit. This is a simple recipe designed for home cooking. I can put a copy up in the kitchen for everyone to try.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hooray!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I'll also let you try my secret recipe for Ursus frozen vegetable soup, Uncle Matterhorn. It's super healthy! Ooh, it'll be like a trade~
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: Sounds delicious. I'll give it a try the next time I'm preparing a midnight snack for the Ladies.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hehehe. I'm sure Pramanix and Cliffheart will love it~
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: (The Lady and the Young Lady, hm...?)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: By the way, Gummy, shouldn't you send along that stew you've been preparing?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's for the Doctor, isn't it? It will get cold if we leave it any longer, and that will affect the taste.... won't it?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oooh! I almost forgot!!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: I better get going! Uncle Matterhorn! The stir-fried greens are mega delicious! Save me the recipe!
attributes.name: Gummy

attributes.content: What a vivacious little girl.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Show yourself.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Then, you'll have to pardon me——
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oof!
Come on, man.
Are we really up to blades and guns now? Where did you pull that out of anyway? And what's it doing in the kitchen? You could hurt somebody.
*Sigh* How'd you know I was here? I thought I was pretty well hidden.
(biting apple)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Stealing food from the kitchen again? There's no need for that. If you're hungry, just go to the cafeteria.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Did you not learn your lesson last time? I recall a logistics operator telling you if you were caught using your powers to take food or ingredients without permission again, you would be punished appropriately.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Punishment? Oh, you mean the one  where they make me wear a sign that says 'I took food from the kitchen'?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What kind of punishment is that? I thought they were joking.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Hey, wait a minute, you still didn't tell me how you found me.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: If you hadn't swiped some of the dish I just made, I wouldn't have noticed your presence.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ahhh, I blew it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I was just going to see if there were any breakfast leftovers I could eat, but that stuff you made smelled so good I couldn't resist.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Sorry, so sorry. Infinitely sorry. More sorry than sorry can be. You don't care that much, do you?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I care.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Phew, that's a relief, I th... Huh?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Wait a minute? What did you just say?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I said I care.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Woah, woah, woah.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: (No way, this could be bad.)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: (If he's gonna get stuck in on this thing, this is a problem that could go places!)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: You....
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Ah, huh? What?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: ——You didn't use a fork. You grabbed the food with your hands. And you didn't even wash them!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: That's unsanitary! It's unacceptable!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: So that's... all you care about?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Hygiene is no laughing matter! Show respect to your food, especially when it's handmade. Every serving of this dish contains a piece of my heart!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Wait, you washed that apple first, didn't you? You need to take care of yourself, as a warrior!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: All right, all right, I get it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That's the same attitude Instructor Dobermann is always getting upset about.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ...Anyway, I shouldn't be butting my horns in there.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Come on, I'm really turning over a new leaf here.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: It's just that, hey, sometimes old habits die hard. And it's the kind of thing I never got to worry about.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: But you got one thing wrong. I did remember to wash my hands this time.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Just splashing water over them for a second doesn't count as washing your hands.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You're a real hardass, man.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Okay, whatever, I'll remember next time.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Frivolous little...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh, by the way, how did you find the dish you just tasted?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Dish? You mean the stir-fried greens?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Didn't that Gummy girl already stroke your ego? Need a quick tug from me too? Sure, fine. It blew me away, incredible flavor. And your biceps are huge.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Any additional glib remarks?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh yeah, tons.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Save them. I'm not sure how much longer I can hold myself back from educating you.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hahaha. Seriously, do you really want to hear the truth?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: All right. I'll give it to you straight. The dish is good, it's tasty. But, how do I put this? I get a confusing feeling when I eat it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Don't talk nonsense. My cooking isn't capable of sparking such feelings.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Gee, you're really no fun at all.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: But sure. You know, I saw you sigh a few times while you were cooking.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Like full on. You were spacing out, and sighing to yourself. It's hard to imagine you put out food this good in a state like that.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Stop, stop.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Forget it, man, don't force it if you don't want to. I don't care at all, really.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: I dunno what's bothering you. But just some advice from ol' Ethan, take a look at the big picture, and don't do this to yourself.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Look at me. There was me, back there, but I'm over that. Can't do anything about it anyway, might as well not think about it. Life at Rhodes Island is good.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Hey, changing the subject, I just wanna ask, what's cooking in your pot over there? Smells really good.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: ........That's braised beastmeat. It's ready to go. I'm about to sprinkle some cheese on it.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's a traditional Kjerag dish. Snowlanders all grow up eating it. I've made some slight adjustments to make the beastmeat more tender.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Oh! That sounds awesome!
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Can I try this too?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Wait, not that, that's——
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Here you are, Matterhorn.
Master! When did you get to Rhodes Island? And why didn't you inform me you were coming?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Just a moment, I'll make you some tea.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: No need, I'm only passing through.
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: It's just a matter of talking to the Doctor about some Kjerag issues. It all came up pretty suddenly, so I didn't have time to tell you.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: There is a lot of pressure. The Master is pushing himself too hard.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: I see...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Setting that aside, Matterhorn, how is Ensia these days?
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: The Young Lady is in good spirits and her condition is under control.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: As you instructed, Courier and I have been keeping an eye on the Lady's health. I prepare a separate lunch for her, to avoid any adverse reactions to Rhodes Island's food.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: That's good. Heat up another pot of salted milk tea while you're at it, Ensia always liked that.
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: Your tastes haven't changed, nor have hers, Master.
attributes.name: Courier

attributes.content: As you wish, Master.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Well, that's that.
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: Thank you.
attributes.name: SilverAsh

attributes.content: I prepared that specially for the Young Lady, at the Master's command. I'll be bringing it to her later. If you're still hungry, I can prepare something else for you.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Yeah, that'd be great. I really wanna get some of that tender meat.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: It's very precious food. Specially requested from operators who were passing by that base. This is all we have.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Not to mention, braised meat takes a tremendous amount of time. You'll just have to make do with regular fried beastmeat.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This is discrimination!
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Beggars can't be choosers!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Fine! I'll earn the good stuff!
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That Master you're talking about, he's your boss, right?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That's Master SilverAsh who pops up every now and then to chat up the Doctor?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: That's right. You've met the Master?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Whether you have or not, I advise you to take a more respectful tone.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: I called him 'Master,' is that not respectful enough?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Anyway, that boss of yours, I heard he's got a couple of younger sisters?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Yes. What of them?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: That Feline girl named Ensia, she's your 'Young Lady,' isn't she?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Real sweet of her brother to send you along to feed her home cooking. He worried the foreign stuff won't agree with her?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: So that's the 'Young Lady.' Where's the 'Old Lady?'
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: ...What exactly are you asking?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: The matter of the Ladies is the Master's private affair. You'd best not ask such questions.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Whew, that's a scary face. Chill, I'm not dumb enough to go sticking my nose into rich people business.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Ah, pass that sauce bottle over there for me.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: This one? Here you go.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Thanks.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Welcome. Ooh, that's starting to smell good.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: And we're done. It's just plain fried beastmeat. But I made a few substitutions. It should taste all right.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: There's bread in the basket over there, and there should be rice in the pot next to it. You can have whatever you like. I need to bring this to the Young Lady now.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Remember to wash your hands before you eat.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Get outta here. Are you my mother?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: No. Thankfully, I'm not.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ...Yeah, get going.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: *Sigh*. Too bad. That braised meat smelled amazing.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Guess I'll wash my hands.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Weird. Since when am I such a good boy?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Okay, do the soap, the thirty seconds on each hand.... Three, two, one. And we're good.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: (shaking out his hands)
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Safe.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: At least wipe your hands before you grab the bread.
Huh?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Who's that?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: ...Nobody. Just a blacksmith.
Hm? Where's Matterhorn?
Thanks, Matterhorn, for the tea.
Mmm, it smells good. Is there some sesame oil in it? That's how I used to take it when I was little. I can't believe you still remember.
You humble me, my Lady.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Now then, I'll leave you to enjoy it. I must be off.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (It must have been the Master who put the sesame oil in the tea for her when she was small.)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (But the Master hasn't had salted milk tea like this since he came back from Victoria. He must have forgotten.)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (My Lady...)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: *Sigh*.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (The Young Lady picked out all the peppers again this time. She's been doing that since she was small.)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (If you keep being so picky with your food, you won't get a balanced diet. Things will only get worse...)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ...Hmm?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: That reminds me, the Master would, in such cases....
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (No, don't go down that road.)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: (It's too dangerous an issue. Better just forget about it.)
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Hey, hey, hey, big guy——
Hm? Who's there?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's me! You see something floating down the corridor, who else could it be?! You stupid?
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Whatever. Here, take this. Don't drop it.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: What's——
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: There you go. I got a thing. Later.
attributes.name: Ethan

attributes.content: Wait!
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ........He's gone.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: What is he doing? It's a... sandwich?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: He burned the bread, didn't cut the edges, and sliced the scalesaur meat too thick, it's...
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Cut him a break.
He worked hard on it. Even put in some tangerine slices. It should taste fine.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: ........Vulcan.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: You must be here for my shield. I left it with a few other pieces that need fixing in the kitchen. I'll fetch them for you.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It's okay, I'll go with.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That guy was pretty chatty while working on that sandwich.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Did Ethan say something unpleasant to you? Let me apologize on his behalf. He speaks without thinking, but there's no malice in him....
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Err, no. Slow down there. It's nothing like that.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: He said he wanted to give Uncle Matterhorn a taste of 'aimless youth cuisine,' as a token of appreciation.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: I guess he put his heart into it. Oh and he walked off with two plates of food that were sitting in the kitchen.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: What nonsense. Such hooliganism.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: It is. But why do I get the sense that you kinda like it?
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: That's ridiculous.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Look me in the eye and say that.
attributes.name: Vulcan

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: ........By the way, how old is Ethan?
attributes.name: Matterhorn

attributes.content: Where does he get off calling me 'Uncle?'
attributes.name: Matterhorn
